CATEGORY.name: $TRIBE0 Oath of Fealty
CATEGORY.desc: Gain this nation's special powers for one battle.

CATEGORY.name: Wonder of the World
CATEGORY.desc: Build a Wonder from this Age or an earlier Age in any occupied territory.

CATEGORY.name: Sabotage
CATEGORY.desc: Reduce the territory strength of an enemy territory by two levels.

CATEGORY.name: $TECHCAT0 Eureka
CATEGORY.desc: Start one battle with extra technology.

CATEGORY.name: $RES0 Economic Boom
CATEGORY.desc: Receive a 5% boost in production for this resource in one battle.

CATEGORY.name: Mercenaries
CATEGORY.desc: Begin one battle with extra troops.

CATEGORY.name: Treachery
CATEGORY.desc: Gain any non-capital territory without a fight. Target territory must be adjacent to your nation and have a strength of four or lower.

CATEGORY.name: Great Thinker
CATEGORY.desc: All research in the next battle is 20% faster and 20% cheaper.

CATEGORY.name: Merchant Guild
CATEGORY.desc: Goods at the Market are 20% cheaper to buy and earn 20% more when sold during one battle.

CATEGORY.name: Logistics
CATEGORY.desc: Units heal 100% faster and are immune to attrition damage during one battle.

CATEGORY.name: Partisans
CATEGORY.desc: Invading enemy troops take 50% more attrition damage during one battle.

CATEGORY.name: Cultural Dominance
CATEGORY.desc: Enemy nations are deprived of their nation powers for one battle.

CATEGORY.name: Trade Embargo
CATEGORY.desc: Enemy nations gain no benefit from their strategic resources in one battle.

CATEGORY.name: Propaganda
CATEGORY.desc: Gain the use of the enemy nation power for one battle.

CATEGORY.name: Skill Bonus
CATEGORY.desc: Start one battle with bonus +$NUM0 of each resource. The bonus amount depends on your performance in the battle where it was awarded.

CATEGORY.name: Commandeer Transport
CATEGORY.desc: Transport one army to any territory that you control that does not have an army.

CATEGORY.name: Brigands
CATEGORY.desc: Reduce an enemy's Capital territory strength by half.

CATEGORY.name: Spy Network
CATEGORY.desc: Start a battle with the map explored.

CATEGORY.name: Elephant Army
CATEGORY.desc: Start a battle with a brigade of War Elephants.

CATEGORY.name: General Parmenio
CATEGORY.desc: Start a battle with General Parmenio. Gives extra Cavalry and increases the attack of nearby Cavalry. Ambush lasts longer and costs less craft. He may be played twice.

CATEGORY.name: General Antipater
CATEGORY.desc: Start a battle with General Antipater. Increases garrison strength. Can Entrench anywhere at 2x speed. While card is held, receive 2x tribute when no attack is made.

CATEGORY.name: General Ptolemy
CATEGORY.desc: Start a battle with General Ptolemy. Units in radius have +1 defense, ranged units shoot further, and siege units have +1 attack. Egyptians will not attack while card is held.

CATEGORY.name: General Memnon
CATEGORY.desc: Start a battle with General Memnon. Always cloaked. 2x craft regeneration speed. Makes nearby Greek Mercenaries as powerful as Phalanx. Play on the strategic map to upgrade a territory 4 levels.

CATEGORY.name: General Spitamenes
CATEGORY.desc: Start a battle with General Spitamenes. Adds extra cavalry. Raises speed and attack of Horse Archers in his radius. On strategic map, turns enemy territory barbarian.

CATEGORY.name: General Porus
CATEGORY.desc: Start a battle with General Porus. Speed bonus to nearby War Elephants, creates 2x decoys, and sees cloaked units. While held, you can build War Elephants.

CATEGORY.name: Traitors
CATEGORY.desc: Get Informers at all enemy military buildings for one battle.

CATEGORY.name: Colony Blockade
CATEGORY.desc: Prevent an enemy from receiving colony income and rare resources for two turns.

CATEGORY.name: Political Dissidents
CATEGORY.desc: Disable the enemy's ability to implement governments for one battle.

CATEGORY.name: Spy Academy
CATEGORY.desc: Start one battle with $NUM0 extra Spies.

CATEGORY.name: Continental System
CATEGORY.desc: Reduce Great Britain's territory strength by two.

CATEGORY.name: Letter of Marque
CATEGORY.desc: Take up to $NUM0 tribute from any nation.

CATEGORY.name: Warpath
CATEGORY.desc: Start one battle with a Barracks, Stable, Siege Factory, and 2 military technologies.

CATEGORY.name: Missionaries
CATEGORY.desc: Temple has $NUM0% greater effect on Borders, Taxation, and City hit points.

CATEGORY.name: Population Boom
CATEGORY.desc: Start one battle with $NUM0 extra Citizens.

CATEGORY.name: Advisor Fouché
CATEGORY.desc: Can force two nations to go to war if played on the strategic map. In a battle, is a triple craft Spy who reveals the map.

CATEGORY.name: Advisor Talleyrand
CATEGORY.desc: Can force a nation to ally with you or go to war with you for one turn and then return to the original diplomatic state.

CATEGORY.name: Commander Schwarzenberg
CATEGORY.desc: Austria will not attack you while held. Appears in battle as an always cloaked Commando. He starts with $NUM0 Commandos, and increases their recharge rate.

CATEGORY.name: Commander Paoli
CATEGORY.desc: Appears in battle as a Commando with double hit points and fast snipe and sabotage. On the strategic map, Paoli can liberate another nation's vassal.

STYLE.title: Surprise Attack!
STYLE.description: Your enemy has launched a surprise attack on this territory. Hold off the attackers and defend your capital to achieve victory.

STYLE.title: Guerrilla Warfare
STYLE.description: The enemy has taken several of your cities. Their morale is not very high, however if enough of their men are eliminated they will likely retreat.

STYLE.title: Conquest
STYLE.objective: Capture the enemy capital(s) or hold out for $NUM0 minutes.
STYLE.description: You are being invaded by a treacherous neighbor. Take the enemy capital(s) or hold off their assault for $NUM0 minutes to force them to withdraw.

STYLE.title: Conquest
STYLE.objective: Capture the enemy capital(s) in $NUM0 minutes.
STYLE.description: The enemy is resisting your invasion. Take their capital(s) in $NUM0 minutes or less to win.

STYLE.title: Field Battle
STYLE.description: Your army is approaching the enemy's army. Attack their encampment and destroy all their buildings in order to win.

STYLE.title: Tactics
STYLE.objective: Find and capture the enemy's capital.
STYLE.description: Expecting no resistance to your invasion, no support troops were included in your expeditionary force. A fortified city has been encountered, however, and must be eliminated.

STYLE.title: Supply Train
STYLE.description: The enemy army has decided that they cannot win this battle and are fleeing with all of their supplies. Destroy their Supply Wagons to gain these supplies for yourself, but be careful; the enemy is not totally helpless. Keep at least one of your units alive until the timer runs out to achieve victory.

STYLE.title: Hideaway
STYLE.objective: Eliminate all enemy Generals or control 70% of the territory.
STYLE.description: The enemy's army is tied up elsewhere, so they have hired mercenaries. These mercenaries can survive without a City and they suffer no attrition. To find them will require some careful scouting; they are aware of your presence and will certainly set up ambushes. And beware--they will raid your homeland relentlessly.
STYLE.victory_text: You have rooted out the mercenaries.

STYLE.title: Ambush
STYLE.objective: Find and capture the enemy's capital in 90 minutes.
STYLE.description: Your army has reached the largest enemy settlement in this territory. Capture the capital in 90 minutes and the territory will fall. The enemy leader is crafty, so beware of ambush by the enemy troops.

STYLE.title: Melee
STYLE.objective: Capture the enemy capital or defeat them by capturing territory in $NUM0 minutes.
STYLE.description: The barbarians in this territory are hostile and must be eliminated. Defeat them by capturing their capitals or capturing most of their territory in $NUM0 minutes.

STYLE.title: Tactics
STYLE.objective: Find and capture the enemy's capital.
STYLE.description: Expecting no resistance to your invasion, no support troops were included in your expeditionary force. A fortified city has been encountered, however, and must be eliminated.

STYLE.title: Barbarian Rally
STYLE.description: Your armies encountered no resistance in taking the territory. However, the natives have rallied and are assaulting your new outpost. Defend your capital until the timer expires to win.

STYLE.title: Field Battle
STYLE.description: Your army is approaching a barbarian army. Attack their encampment and destroy all their buildings in order to win.

STYLE.title: Nomad
STYLE.description: You have successfully established a new settlement, but several nomadic tribes also claim this territory. Eliminate them in order to protect your people.
STYLE.victory_text: You have defeated all of the nomad tribes.
STYLE.defeat_text: You were unable to defeat all of the nomad tribes.

STYLE.title: Sudden Death
STYLE.objective: Capture one city from each nation to defeat them in $NUM0 minutes.
STYLE.description: The barbarian nations in this region are weak and sure to kneel to your nation if you are able to prove your superiority by capturing one of their cities in $NUM0 minutes. They must capture your capital to defeat you.

STYLE.title: Wheel and Deal
STYLE.objective: Defeat the barbarian tribes in 120 minutes.
STYLE.description: There are several native tribes in this territory vying for power. Use your diplomatic skills to play them off of each other and ensure your own dominance in the area. Defeat the barbarian tribes in 120 minutes.

STYLE.title: War Party
STYLE.description: Settlers from far away are encroaching onto your lands. Lead your war party in an effort to drive them off. Destroy 25 enemy units.

STYLE.title: Barbarians at the Gates!
STYLE.objective: Hold off the enemy until the timer expires.
STYLE.description: A group of barbarian tribes in this region have united together to destroy you. Fortunately you brought extra supplies and the barbarians are an Age behind you. Survive until the timer expires to win.
